name: Dakota purse/wallet
description:
Meticulously crafted raw-edge boot leather purse/wallet in deep espresso-brown with removable cross body chain. Hand wrapped brass wire closure and interior zipper pocket.  Great as a small bag or a clutch wallet. 

8" W x 4" H x 1.25" D
48" strap length

name: Mikal Winn mesh cuff
description: Inspired by the natural beauty surrounding his studio in the Mojave Desert, Mikal Winn's pieces are a unique mix of rugged nature and urban sparkle. Each piece is hand-crafted using his unique silver soldering technique and is signed by the designer. With an earthy, weathered feel these intriguing mesh cuffs are finished in an oxidized silver finish. 1.125" W Made in California. For more styles from Mikal Winn click here.

name: Mikal Winn mesh bangle
description: Inspired by the natural beauty surrounding his studio in the Mojave Desert, Mikal Winn's pieces are a unique mix of rugged nature and urban sparkle. Each piece is hand-crafted using his unique silver soldering technique and is signed by the designer. With an earthy, weathered feel these intriguing mesh bangles are finished in an oxidized silver finish. Made in California. For more styles from Mikal Winn click here.

name: Mikal Winn mesh ring
description: Inspired by the natural beauty surrounding his studio in the Mojave Desert, Mikal Winn's pieces are a unique mix of rugged nature and urban sparkle. Each piece is hand-crafted using his unique silver soldering technique and is signed by the designer. With an earthy, weathered feel these intriguing mesh rings are designed to be adjustable in size with an open back, and are available in an oxidized silver finish (A) or oxidized brass finish (B). Made in California. For more styles from Mikal Winn click here.

name: big duck bath brush
description: For more than a hundred years, the Iris Hantverk company has been producing some of the worlds most beautiful, functional, and high quality brushes. Excellent examples of the Scandinavian ideal of beautiful, everyday objects, these brushes are perfectly balanced and suited to their respective tasks. Each brush, constructed of hardwoods with hand wired natural bristles, is made by hand by visually impaired craftsmen, and is designed to provide years of use as well as an ecological alternative to plastic throwaway brushes. Made of oil-treated oak and soft pure horse hair. For wet or dry use. Brushing the skin stimulates circulation and exfoliation, helps eliminate toxins and reduces cellulite...always brush towards your heart. These brushes age well when cleaned with dishwashing liquid and warm water. To keep the wood from splitting, dry with the bristles facing down, and from time to time treat the wood with a little mineral oil. 5" H x 5" D To see other items in the Iris Hantverk collection click here.

name: puck bath brush
description: For more than a hundred years, the Iris Hantverk company has been producing some of the worlds most beautiful, functional, and high quality brushes. Excellent examples of the Scandinavian ideal of beautiful, everyday objects, these brushes are perfectly balanced and suited to their respective tasks. Each brush, constructed of hardwoods with hand wired natural bristles, is made by hand by visually impaired craftsmen, and is designed to provide years of use as well as an ecological alternative to plastic throwaway brushes. Made of oil-treated oak and soft pure horse hair. For wet or dry use. Brushing the skin stimulates circulation and exfoliation, helps eliminate toxins and reduces cellulite...always brush towards your heart. These brushes age well when cleaned with dishwashing liquid and warm water. To keep the wood from splitting, dry with the bristles facing down, and from time to time treat the wood with a little mineral oil. 2" H x 3" D To see other items in the Iris Hantverk collection click here.

name: nail brush on a rope
description: For more than a hundred years, the Iris Hantverk company has been producing some of the worlds most beautiful, functional, and high quality brushes. Excellent examples of the Scandinavian ideal of beautiful, everyday objects, these brushes are perfectly balanced and suited to their respective tasks. Each brush, constructed of hardwoods with hand wired natural bristles, is made by hand by visually impaired craftsmen, and is designed to provide years of use as well as an ecological alternative to plastic throwaway brushes. Made of oil-treated oak and sturdy tampico fiber. These brushes age well when cleaned with dishwashing liquid and warm water. To keep the wood from splitting, dry with the bristles facing down, and from time to time treat the wood with a little mineral oil. 4" L x 1.5" W x 1.25" H To see other items in the Iris Hantverk collection click here.

description:
Exquisite handmade brass and wood paper knife.

7.75" L

Made in Japan.

name: set of 6 black coffee spoons

4.25" L

Made in Portugal.

name: cast iron rabbit bottle opener
description:
Tadahiro Baba is a Japanese craft designer of objects made in the traditional Japanese Nambu Tekki (cast iron) technique. His designs feature fluid shaping with a distinctive modern edge. These elegant rabbits will open bottles with their tails...or simply use this graceful miniature sculpture as a lovely tabletop adornment.

1.25" H x 6.375" L

Made in Japan.

name: horseshoe charm necklace
description:
Charming horseshoe talisman strung on an oxidized brass chain with claw clasp.

pendant: 5/8" L
chain: 18" L

name: rustic heart ornament
description: Iron is plated with brass and then silver to create the rustic variegated look of these ornaments. The heart shape is also a bell and comes ready to hang with a jute loop. 3.5" W x 3.5" H Made in India. To see other items in the Roost collection click here.

name: rustic bird ornament
description: Iron is plated with brass and then silver to create the rustic variegated look of these ornaments. Comes ready to hang with a jute loop. 4.5" W x 3" H Made in India. To see other items in the Roost collection click here.

name: set of 3 brass origami bowls
description: The forms of these stunning cast brass vessels are inspired by the Japanese art of origami. Set of three nesting bowls: measures 8" in diameter for the largest to 4" for the smallest.

name: set of 3 aluminum origami bowls
description: The forms of these stunning cast aluminum vessels are inspired by the Japanese art of origami. Set of three nesting bowls: measures 8" in diameter for the largest to 4" for the smallest.

name: cast iron incense burner

These elegant yet heavy-weight 3-legged incense burners are made using four-century old Japanese Nambu Tekki (cast iron) techniques.

6" L x 2" H

Made in Japan.

name: hammered silver candlesticks
description:
Each delicately crafted candlestick is constructed from high quality stainless steel that is hand-hammered, and then plated with silver and polished to a lustrous finish. Base is weighted for stability. Easily accommodates any taper diameter.

small: 4.5" H
medium: 6.5" H
large: 8.25" H

name: set of 3 indigo "mille fleurs" tealight holders
description:

3"D x 3.25"H

name: indigo moth hurricane
description:
Gorgeous moth hurricane candle holder in a rich matte indigo blue lined with mercury glass.

4" D x 5" H

name: solid brass bicycle bell
description:
This sweet little bicycle bell was created by the Tokyo San-Esu Co in 1974 and is still in production today. Made of solid brass, it strikes a clear and friendly tone with each strike of the lever. Brass is rust-proof and will mellow over time to a rich patina.

2" H x 1.75" D

Made in Japan.

name: horn 4x6 frame
description: These picture frames are created from squares of water buffalo horn that are adhered to a hardwood form which can stand in either a portrait or landscape position. No two horn items will be exactly alike in color striations due to the natural variations in the horn itself. picture size: 4" x 6" total size: 6.75" x 8.75" To see other items in the Roost collection click here.

name: mango wood 4x6 frame
description: This sophisticated dark mango wood frame has a luxuriously smooth feel to it. Hand carved with a lightly distressed finish, the frame can stand in either a portrait or landscape position. Mango trees are initially grown for their fruit but once the trees reach a certain size and age, they stop bearing fruit. It is then that the trees can be cut down and the wood used to create beautiful products. This not only means that none of the wood is wasted but offers a supplementary income to the farmers. picture size: 4" x 6" total size: 9.25" x 11.25" To see other items in the Nkuku collection click here.

name: glass 3x3 picture frame
description:
This handsome glass + metal picture frame holds a 3" x 3" photo. Crafted with the greatest attention to detail using a copper foil method (and lead-free solder) first developed by Louis Comfort Tiffany in the late 1800s.

picture size: 3" x 3"
total size: 7" x 7"

name: glass 4x6 picture frame
description:
This handsome glass + metal picture frame can stand in either a portrait or landscape position and holds a 4" x 6" photo. Crafted with the greatest attention to detail using a copper foil method (and lead-free solder) first developed by Louis Comfort Tiffany in the late 1800s.

picture size: 4" x 6"
total size: 8" x 10"

name: glass 5x7 picture frame
description:
This handsome glass + metal picture frame can stand in either a portrait or landscape position and holds a 5" x 7" photo. Crafted with the greatest attention to detail using a copper foil method (and lead-free solder) first developed by Louis Comfort Tiffany in the late 1800s.

picture size: 5" x 7"
total size: 9.5" x 11.5"

name: 6" wrought iron wall hook
description: These wrought iron hooks are strong and extremely useful. 6" L Made in India. To see other items in the HomArt collection click here.

name: 4" wrought iron wall hook
description: These wrought iron hooks are strong and extremely useful. 4" L Made in India. To see other items in the HomArt collection click here.

name: Turkish hanging lantern - 5" D
description: The tops and bottoms are made of tin-coated copper, the body in between with coiled wire covered in unbleached cotton. Candle holder in base. 5" D Click here for the perfect wall hook for hanging our lanterns. To see other items by Ottomania click here.

name: pleated porcelain string lights
description: From Portland's Pigeon Toe Ceramics, this set of ten ultra thin translucent unglazed porcelain shades are strung on an indoor/outdoor green cord of string lights (if one bulb burns out, the others stay lit). Simple assembly is required (instructions provided). Founded in 2009 by designer Lisa Jones, Pigeon Toe's aspiration is simple: to design unique objects that provide everyday beauty. Each piece is made with skilled hands to be naturally imperfect and casually charming. The result is objects that appear discovered, rather than acquired. Each shade: 2.5" H x 4.5" D Cord length: 11' with 12" bulb spacing To see other items by Pigeon Toe Ceramics click here.

name: porcelain ripple vase - single
description: Inspired by water, each piece in the "ripple" collection has been designed to combine the durability and beauty of porcelain with a clearly hand-made and modern minimalist aesthetic. The collection is clay-dyed (meaning the pigment is added to the porcelain at the slip stage) to provide depth and durability of color. This means that, if needed, scratches can be buffed from the vitrified surface with an abrasive powder or cream without causing damage to the finish. The interior of each piece is finished with a clear glaze while the exterior is left unglazed, giving a matte stone-like surface. 16.5" H To see other items in the ripple collection click here.

name: test tube vase with stand
description:
Cast iron stand paired with authentic laboratory glass test tube.

14" H

name: glass keepsake box
description:
This handsome keepsake box is crafted with the greatest attention to detail using a copper foil method (and lead-free solder) first developed by Louis Comfort Tiffany in the late 1800s.

5" x 5" x 5"

name: glass jewel-top box
description:
These handsome beveled glass boxes are crafted with the greatest attention to detail.

2.75" W x 3" D x 2.5" H

name: Montmartre glass dome
description: This beautiful soft-rounded organically shaped glass dome on a footed ebonized wood base evokes museum-quality displays. Use it to showcase a wealth of items, from curios to jewelry. 7.25"D x 10"H To see other items in the Roost collection click here.

name: brass lassi cup
description:
Beautifully etched and patinaed brass lassi cups. Each one is hand-carved with unique surface patterns. Use for holding kitchen utensils or as a vase.

7"H (approximately)

*Please note that the surface patterns will vary from piece to piece and from those pictured.

name: sun brass trivet
description: The work of Masanori Oji is simplified down to the bare essentials...designed to fit comfortably into everyday life, to be truly functional yet vanish into the background...what he calls "living products". Even the packaging and graphics, also designed by Oji, are a subtle masterpiece of minimal beauty! This unique and elegant solid brass sun trivet is made with unsurpassed craftsmanship in collaboration with Japanese company Futagami, who have been producing metal objects for over a century. The textural "raw" finish will gradually oxidize over time, gracing your home for many years to come with it's natural beauty. 6"D x .375"H Made in Japan. For a little more about Masanori Oji click here.

name: tea glasses
description:
Savor your favorite tea in these lovely silver-embellished Moroccan tea glasses or use them to enhance a votive candle. Hand wash only. Sold individually.

2.5"D x 4"H

Made in Morocco.

name: variegated horn spreaders
description:
The natural beauty of these variegated horn spreaders will enhance any table. Each piece has been carefully prepared by several courses of buffing, sanding and polishing to maximize coloring and grain. No two horn items will be exactly alike in color striations due to the natural variations in the horn itself. Hand wash only.

6.25" L

description:

name: copper graters
description:
Each "tooth" of these beautiful palm-sized graters is carved out and pointed upwards by craftsmen using techniques from the Edo period. Because they are handmade, the shape and length of each tooth is slightly distinct, which helps intensify the overall grating effect, preventing the ginger or garlic from merely being crushed, keeping it fresh and perfect in taste! Made in Japan from tin-plated copper.

turtle: 4" H x 2.75" W
crane: 3.75" H x 3.25" W

The collection is clay-dyed (meaning the pigment is added to the porcelain at the slip stage) to provide depth and durability of color. This means that, if needed, scratches can be buffed from the vitrified surface with an abrasive powder or cream without causing damage to the finish. The exterior is left unglazed, giving a matte stone-like surface. name: white mango wood platter - large
description:
Mango wood is collected from trees on mango plantations that naturally, after 15-30 years, stop producing fruit. When cut down, a new young tree is immediately planted in its place to continue the cycle. Due to this  natural process of harvesting, this mango wood is a fully sustainable resource.

6.25" - 7.5" L

name: ringed cutting boards
description: Based in Montreal, Objets Mécaniques is a slow design “laboratory” whose mission is to design handmade everyday objects. Each object is born with particular features which make it unique and authentic. The plump and sturdy 1.3 cutting board and the tall and elegant 1.2 cutting board are both made of cherry wood with a layer of white milk paint on the ring handles. 1.2 board: 23" L x 8.5" W x .75" H 1.3 board: 16" L x 10" W x .75" H To see other items by Objets Mécaniques click here.

name: whale tongs
description: Conceived for Design House Stockholm by David Mayhew these innovative bamboo tongs can be used for cooking or serving. The two pieces are held together with strong magnets which can then be pulled apart for easy cleaning and storage. Hand wash only. 10.5" L To see other items in the Design House Stockholm collection click here.

name: bamboo pick up - large
description: Conceived for Design House Stockholm by Stig Ahlström these bamboo "pick ups" can be used throughout the kitchen for cooking, eating and serving. Hand wash only. 13.5" L To see other items in the Design House Stockholm collection click here.

name: wooden muddlers
description:
Prepare drinks in style with these hand-carved sheesham wood muddlers. Sheesham (also known as Indian Rosewood) is a fast-growing hardwood, sourced from sustainable managed plantations. Three distinct styles to choose from.

10" L

Made in India.

description:
Elegantly useful handcrafted wood citrus juicer. Made without chemical finishes or lacquers and fair trade certified.

6.25" L

name: set of 12 large bistro tumblers
description: These classic bistro tumblers are simple and sturdy enough for everyday and elegant enough for entertaining. Set of 12. Tempered and dishwasher safe. 4.75" H / 17 ounces Made in Italy. Please note: This item is only available for shipping within the United States.

name: cast brass bottle openers
description:
The work of Fort Standard, founded in 2011 by Gregory Buntain and Ian Collings, pairs timeless materials and traditional methods of production with innovative modern process to create a “warm-contemporary” aesthetic.

Cast in brass directly from hand carved waxes, these satisfyingly functional tools show evidence of their handmade origin with the character of filing marks and a raw unfinished feel.

name: crow bottle opener - tall
description:
Tadahiro Baba is a Japanese craft designer of objects made in the traditional four-century old Japanese Nambu Tekki (cast iron) technique. His designs feature fluid shaping with a distinctive modern edge. These little crow openers are sand-cast and then lacquered to deter rust. Punch a hole in a can with his beak, or remove a bottle cap under his tail...or simply use this graceful miniature sculpture as a lovely tabletop adornment.

2.25" H x 3.25" W

name: crow bottle opener - short
description:
Tadahiro Baba is a Japanese craft designer of objects made in the traditional four-century old Japanese Nambu Tekki (cast iron) technique. His designs feature fluid shaping with a distinctive modern edge. These little crow openers are sand-cast and then lacquered to deter rust. Punch a hole in a can with his beak, or remove a bottle cap under his tail...or simply use this graceful miniature sculpture as a lovely tabletop adornment.

1.5" H x 4" W

description:
Open up that ice-cold bottle of beer in style with this cast iron whale bottle opener...he also makes a good paper weight!

5" L

name: whiskey stones
description:
Ideal for chilling your favorite spirit without diluting its flavor. Made of soft, odorless and tasteless soapstone, they retain their chill for extended periods of time and won't scratch the glass. Simply keep the stones in your freezer and you'll always have a few handy. Set of 8.

Made in Finland.

name: chased metal trays
description:
An elegant medallion pattern is chased into the surface of these beautiful oval aluminum trays. Smooth wooden handles and their light weight allow for easy transport. Available in 3 sizes.

small: 18.75" x 14"
medium: 21" x 15"
large: 23" x 17.5"

Made in India.

name: kitchen guide apron
description: A kitchen aid at your finger tips, this apron protects your clothes and offers instant cooking guides including conversion tables, defrosting times, chicken roasting chart, cooking glossary, vegetable cooking times and more. The guide is written upside down so you only need to pick up the bottom of the apron to read it right side up in front of you. Made from natural unbleached cotton. Designed by John Caswell. Machine washable.

name: iron push pins
description: These decorative (and functional) iron push pins make for great utilitarian style on any cork board or wall. Priced individually so you can buy as many as you need. 1.75" L To see other items in the HomArt collection click here.

name: colored pencils + brass holder set
description:
Escape the ordinary with this updated desktop brass pencil holder. Comes with a full set of 25 colored pencils.

7"H x 4"D

Made in India.

name: Midori brass pens
description: Midori, a Japanese stationery maker, have been creating beautiful lines of desktop accessories, paper products and notebooks since 1950. Their sophisticated design aesthetic combines beauty, functionality, and a special attention to materials. These unique brass ballpoint pens from Midori, are a Japanese reinterpretation of a classic American writing instrument. Fine-point black ink cartridges are housed inside a wood casing with a solid metal clip and top loop for a key chain or lanyard. The brass elements will develop a characteristic vintage look over time. 4" L (capped) To see other items by Midori click here.

name: Midori brass number clips
description: Midori, a Japanese stationery maker, have been creating beautiful lines of desktop accessories, paper products and notebooks since 1950. Their sophisticated design aesthetic combines beauty, functionality, and a special attention to materials. These solid brass clips are small but powerful!  Numbered from 1 through 12, they can be used to hold small paper items together, index your agenda book by month, or as bookmarks in your recipe book. These lovely items have a nostalgic feel which will inspire you to use and cherish them for years to come. Brass, an alloy of copper and zinc, has its own warm tone and, as you use it over the years, its surface oxidizes to become a deep one-of-a-kind hue. each clip: .75" x 1.25" Designed in Japan, made in China. To see other items by Midori click here.

name: Midori brass index clips
description: Midori, a Japanese stationery maker, have been creating beautiful lines of desktop accessories, paper products and notebooks since 1950. Their sophisticated design aesthetic combines beauty, functionality, and a special attention to materials. These solid brass index clips can be used to organize your notebooks, your agenda, your recipe files...or anything you choose. Comes as a set of six with ten cut-out cardboard labels. These lovely items have a nostalgic feel which will inspire you to use and cherish them for years to come. Brass, an alloy of copper and zinc, has its own warm tone and, as you use it over the years, its surface oxidizes to become a deep one-of-a-kind hue. each clip: 1.125" x 1.125" Designed in Japan, made in China. To see other items by Midori click here.

name: Midori brass label plates
description: Midori, a Japanese stationery maker, have been creating beautiful lines of desktop accessories, paper products and notebooks since 1950. Their sophisticated design aesthetic combines beauty, functionality, and a special attention to materials. These solid brass label plates can be attached with a double-sided sticker (included) to everything from albums and sketchbooks, to boxes, to place cards for a formal dinner. Comes as a set of six and also includes cardboard cutout labels. These lovely items have a nostalgic feel which will inspire you to use and cherish them for years to come. Brass, an alloy of copper and zinc, has its own warm tone and, as you use it over the years, its surface oxidizes to become a deep one-of-a-kind hue. each clip: 1.75" x .75" Designed in Japan, made in China. name: embossed notebooks
description:
These slim lay-flat notebooks have a flexible cover embellished with a beautiful all-over Paseo design, which has been embossed like an old Moroccan leather folio. small: 4.25" W x 5.75" H (A6)
medium: 5.75" W x 8.25" H (A5)
large: 7" W x 9.75" H (B5)

name: Midori MD notebook
description: Midori, a Japanese stationery maker, have been creating beautiful lines of desktop accessories, paper products and notebooks since 1950. Their sophisticated design aesthetic combines beauty, functionality, and a special attention to materials. Marrying the concepts of simple and modern with premium quality, these notebooks highlight the beauty of paper and the art of writing. The interior cream-colored pages are string-bound to allow the book to be opened flat, and the exterior is embellished with a white cloth binding over the spine. You may also customize your notebook with the included stickers (IDEA, DIARY, or blank). Each notebook also comes with a removable crisp white velum cover and a colored bookmark string. The paper is resistant to bleeding and strike-throughs and is excellent for writing or sketching. 176 blank pages (88 sheets) 6"W x 8.25"H To see other items by Midori click here.

name: Midori spiral notebooks
description: Midori, a Japanese stationery maker, have been creating beautiful lines of desktop accessories, paper products and notebooks since 1950. Their sophisticated design aesthetic combines beauty, functionality, and a special attention to materials. These pocket-sized concept books are available in three types, each with its own unique characteristics. The spiral bindings make it easy to open flat. The kraft covers are made of base paper infused with resin to make them sturdy and resistant...and are each subtly embossed with an image of their respective animal. Polar Bear: Pure white unlined paper bound with silver rings. The paper is resistant to bleeding and strike-throughs and is excellent for writing or sketching. 200 pages (100 sheets) Camel: Fine unlined kraft paper bound with copper rings. The paper is resistant to bleeding and strike-throughs and is excellent for writing or sketching. 160 pages (80 sheets) Kangaroo: Uses cream paper with gold rings and is a hybrid between a sketchbook and an envelope. Each page is constructed as a paper pouch making it easy to store trinkets from your travels, maps, receipts, postcards, etc. There is also plenty of space for writing and drawing. 32 pouches (16 sheets) All are 5.5" W x 9" H All are designed and made in Japan. To see other items by Midori click here.

name: Midori horizontal envelopes - set of 8

These beautifully designed kraft envelopes with string closure are perfect for keeping track of small and precious items or to use as a gift package. They can also be placed in your notebook with double sided tape to give you customized pockets for receipts, clippings, tickets, etc. Comes as a set of eight. 6.75" W x 4.5" H Designed in Japan, made in Thailand. description: The Mucu line, built on Japanese traditions with a focus on quality and attention to detail, always demonstrates a refreshing emphasis on simple elegance with each piece being individually hand-finished by skilled craftsmen. name: Kinfolk magazine - volume 8
description:
In the words of Nathan Williams (the founding editor and art director of Kinfolk)...

"Kinfolk is a growing community of artists with a shared interest in small gatherings. We recognize that there is something about a table shared by friends, not just a wedding or once-a-year holiday extravaganza, that anchors our relationships and energizes us. We have come together to create Kinfolk as our collaborative way of advocating the natural approach to entertaining that we love.”

Volume 8 is a glimpse of Japan through the Kinfolk lens. This special issue focuses on its traditions and fun things to do (origami flowers, hand-dyed indigo, ikebana); delicious indigenous snacks (ramen, cherry blossom macarons, mochi, pickled cabbage); the harvest process behind green tea, wasabi and seaweed, along with interviews with some of the country’s finest makers and artisans who live and work in the country and abroad, with the usual focus on laid-back entertaining and great ideas for gatherings.

name: Creative Walls
description: Geraldine James, who works at Selfridges in London as home buying manager, has a passion for collecting and finding the most unusual and unique treasures for the home. In her recent book, Creative Walls, she provides an inspirational guide designed to help you arrange the collections you treasure to best effect, and give your home character and charm.

name: Pale + Interesting
description: In Pale & Interesting, UK-based stylist Atlanta Bartlett and her partner in life and designer Dave Coote reveal their passion for decorating with a muted palette of subtle shades. The look combines their creative approach with the reality of busy family life, resulting in a stylish yet comfortable home that's easy to live in and easy on the eye. They start by taking a look at the design philosophy behind the look, then map out the key elements of the look, and finally take a tour throughout the home, revealing how easy it is to live with chalky pastels, earthy natural tones, understated neutrals and muted vintage shades to create a fresh, light and airy home that's a joy to live in. Photography by Polly Wreford.

name: Simply Scandinavian
description:
Scandinavian interior design is admired the world over for its unpretentious simplicity and understated elegance. Homes are enviably relaxed and rooms are typically airy, bright, and filled with furniture and objects that celebrate the beauty of natural materials. 

London-based journalist and author Sara Norrman grew up in Stockholm and spent her summers at a 19th-century summer house in the Swedish countryside. The 20 homes featured in her book are presented as case studies, with chapters including Elegant Simplicity, Pared-down Modern, Contemporary Rustic and Eclectic. Each home showcases an aspect of Scandinavian interior design and the homeowners include architects, fashion and jewelry designers and antiques dealers.

name: West Third candles
description: By fragrance master Michael Loring-Probst, West Third Brand candles are hand poured with a proprietary blend of vegetable and refined paraffin wax, and a very high fragrance ratio using the finest perfume and natural oils that are to be found. Each candle is slip-covered in a hand-stamped muslin bag. 10 ounces / 95 hour burn time Made in the USA. Ambre Notti Ancient amber embraced with patchouli, vanilla, ginger, white musk, + tonka bean, undercurrents of cedar & sandalwood. Amerique American oak and teak infused with patchouli with layers of cedar notes, mandarin peel, coumarin, clove and sensual ylang ylang. Basilica Noir Old world labdanum + olibanum laced with spicy clove + bitter orange embraced with cedarwood, fir balsam and patchouli. Campo il Fiore Black currant, bergamot, black pepper, pine green tuberose and fresh white flowers, riddled with musk and sultry amber combined with ylang-ylang + spice. Foret Noire An unexpected fusion of ylang, anise, ginger, lavender, rose and jasmine on a complex base of musk, vetiver, rich vanilla, dark sandalwood + a pinch of patchouli. Gardenia di Vita An intoxicating blend of fresh gardenias + freesia with hints of orange blossom + cucumber notes. Marche de Tabac A blend of orange, anise, cedar and sandalwood are muddled with tobacco absolute, clove, nutmeg and white musk. Oudh Noire Aromatic Oud wood laced with patchouli, red rose, sandalwood, benzoin, night jasmine infused with blackened teakwood with traces of fresh balsam, cardamom, vanilla + musk. Saint Patron A sophisticated blend of tuberose, jasmine, orange flower, violet, musk, cedar, orris + sandalwood with hints of mandarin + bergamot. Vert Vetiver Sicilian bergamot, lemon and grapefruit layered with vetiver + lily with nuances of patchouli, fennel, cedar wood + a layer of musk. Vintage Leather An intricate balance of moss, tobacco, cedar + leather layered with patchouli, musk + night blooming jasmine.

name: Humanoid lamp coat - blackish
description: From Arnhem in The Netherlands, the Humanoid collection does not scream for attention, but rather, has an identity that feels familiar...two-feet-on-the-ground, expressive, creative, authentic, always functional and contemporary. Every collection originates from the feel of the materials...the way they drape and move, how they behave, how they feel on the skin. They appear to be worn in and washed, they all match in earthy shades, and work together in multiple comfortable layers. Done in a beautifully textured wool-blend fabric with a subtle touch of copper sparkle, this easy menswear-inspired coat is fully lined with cotton and comes with a 3/4"-wide leather belt. Dry clean. 42" L (measured from high-point-shoulder) 40% virgin wool / 28% acrylic / 17% polyester / 7% polyamide / 3% viscose / 1% elastane To see other styles by Humanoid click here.

name: Burning Torch brisbane dress <s>$358.00</s>
description: Burning Torch designer, Karen Craven, is committed to recycling materials and her collections are driven by a vision that melds vintage, modern, and organic. Classic-with-a-twist shirt dress in a lovely crinkly high-twist viscose/wool yarn-dye plaid. Hidden front placket, pockets, button-cuff on sleeve, self belt, shirt-tail hem. Dry clean only. 42" L (measured from high-point-shoulder) 52% viscose / 25% virgin wool / 23% polyester For more styles from Burning Torch click here.

name: Humanoid coco chef dress - steel <s>$175.00</s>
description: From Arnhem in The Netherlands, the Humanoid collection does not scream for attention, but rather, has an identity that feels familiar...two-feet-on-the-ground, expressive, creative, authentic, always functional and contemporary. Every collection originates from the feel of the materials...the way they drape and move, how they behave, how they feel on the skin. They appear to be worn in and washed, they all match in earthy shades, and work together in multiple comfortable layers. Short-sleeve shirt dress with drop waist tie belt, slash pockets, banded neck, back yoke, and bias taping over back seams and at hem. Machine washable. 42" L (measured from high-point-shoulder) 100% cotton To see other styles by Humanoid click here.

name: Jaunt geometric print dress <s>$235.00</s>
description: Jaunt designer, Ana Lerario-Geller is known for combining an intricate blend of hand-made details with casual and modern styles to create a romantic and edgy look. Printed linen jersey knit dress with easy fit. Front and back banded yoke, banded sleeve opening and neck finished in a double layer of silk crinkle chiffon. Full light-weight viscose jersey lining below the yoke seam joins with the outer shell to form a "bubble" hem. Dry clean only. 44" L (measured from high-point-shoulder) To see other styles by Jaunt click here.

name: Henry + Belle super skinny ankle
description:
Henry Mann and his wife Belle first started designing in the garment district of Chicago in 1931. Inspired by Belle's confident character and chic sophistication, Henry designed each style with Belle as his muse and they always focused on the highest quality fabrics and finishes. Today the founders' grandson, Rob Mann, continues to fulfill this tradition of craftsmanship.

Henry + Belle offer a great (and true to size) fit with X-Fit Lycra, a 4-way stretch technology. These jeans retain their shape all day long and can be worn by anyone who wants to feel both undeniably sexy and undeniably comfortable at the same time.

The super skinny ankle has a straight waistband and faux front pockets for a smoother fit.

Inseam: 29"
Wash: Onyx

name: Henry + Belle signature super skinny ankle
description:
Henry Mann and his wife Belle first started designing in the garment district of Chicago in 1931. Inspired by Belle's confident character and chic sophistication, Henry designed each style with Belle as his muse and they always focused on the highest quality fabrics and finishes. Today the founders' grandson, Rob Mann, continues to fulfill this tradition of craftsmanship.

Henry + Belle offer a great (and true to size) fit with X-Fit Lycra, a 4-way stretch technology. These jeans retain their shape all day long and can be worn by anyone who wants to feel both undeniably sexy and undeniably comfortable at the same time.

The signature super skinny ankle has a contoured waistband and faux front pockets for a smoother fit.

Inseam: 29.5"
Wash: Black

name: Hartford end-on-end cotton ankle pant - grey <s>$198.00</s>
description: Begun in 1979 in NYC as a casual vintage-inspired mens shirt collection, Hartford, now based in France, has grown into a fully-fledged line for both men and women. Still inspired by the modern reinvention of classic styles, the collection is contemporary, stylish, but never trendy. Synonymous with quality fabrics, and above all, with authenticity, the priority is cut, proportion, color and a twist of the unexpected. Finely woven stretch end-on-end cotton pant with traditional menswear finishing on the inside. Two clean-finished slash pockets on the front, two single-welt pockets on the back, 5 belt loops. Dry clean only. 95% cotton / 5% elastane 27" inseam / 13" leg opening (size M) To see other styles by Hartford click here.

name: Marika Charles sunset skirt <s>$180.00</s>

Marika Contompasis is an accomplished artist who has exhibited at the Smithsonian, MoMA and the Metropolitan Museum of Art. Charles Contompasis has a passion for textiles and printing techniques. name: G1 Goods stretch twill skirt - sage <s>$130.00</s>
description: G1 Goods have perfected the concept of the “new basic" by mixing simple timeless style, detail-driven quality, first rate fit, washes that result in the perfect patina, and a modern fit. Machine wash. 21" L 98% cotton / 2% spandex To see other styles by G1 click here.

name: Eka chini scarf <s>$110.00</s>
description: Each season Eka explores traditional Indian hand-crafted textile techniques with master weavers, dyers, block makers, embroiderers and textile printers, to create a subtle and unique collection of light-weight khadi clothing and accessories. Khadi is traditional Indian hand-spun and hand-woven cotton cloth and is known for being durable, long-lasting and organic in nature. Wash gently. 39"W x 80"L + 2.5" fringe each end 100% cotton To see other styles by Eka click here.

name: heathered linen accent scarves <s>$78.00</s>
description: These simple gauze-weave scarves are hand-loomed from 100% organic linen by an artisan collective in India. By paying the artisans a life-changing living wage centuries-old fabric dyeing and hand-looming traditions are rejuvenated. The health of the environment is protected from beginning to end by choosing linen that grows naturally pesticide-free and is not water intensive, and using natural plant and mineral-based dyes and mordants. 15" W x 74" L + 3" fringe on each end To see other items by Slow Color click here.
